title: Mean function
question: Implement a function mean(array) that returns the mean (also known as average) of the values inside array, which is an array of numbers.

title: portotype
question: The Function.prototype.call() method calls the function with a given this value and arguments provided individually. Implement your own Function.prototype.call without calling the native call method. To avoid overwriting the actual Function.prototype.call, implement the function as Function.prototype.myCall.
